title: Patch 7.21 lags after patch
body:
Having trouble with the following things after the last patch:
- Trouble logging in, takes ages to login.
- Content takes ages to load when i actually login, even says that it has problems connection
- ingame 160fps, 15ms still have lag spikes

Anyone else experiencing these problems?
A solution would be nice :)

replies.body: so much lag... I have ping spikes up to 1000 when mine rarely goes over 45

I had 400 fps before this patch and now I have like 15-120 fps which drops mostly in teamfights... When it's early game I have kind of 90-120 fps and then late game when all go mid or jungle or whenever it becomes like 15-60 fps...
Even in patch 7.22 it continues...
I have tried to check my packet loss and ms up to the EUNE server and I got no packet loss and 33 ms average 
{{summoner:14}} 
Also I forgot to tell I had tried to run some other higher required games to check that if it my video card or my computer at all... It's fine everywhere else...

This kinda sounds like your network might be having some pretty heavy packet loss issues. Let's check for that first to try and figure out exactly what's going wrong here. Use a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a traceroute to the EUW servers at 192.64.170.252 then reply here with what it gives you. Should be able to see where your connection is having problems with that.

Yes! Having the exact same thing! The HP bars (on everything) is a really old bug I thought they'd solved and I was disappointed to see it re-emerge. I have recently created a post about this very thing but glad to see others showing up. I tried a search before but I guess I didn't include the 'right' words; hate to make duplicate posts. D:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2gRKwaAa-league-disconnecting
Finally im not the only one!
